Package game.gameactors.enemies

Interface DeathRuneDroppper

All Known Implementing Classes:
Astrologer, Bandit, BlackflameMonk, CastleEnemy, DireWolf, Dog, EarthEnemy, Enemy, FireEnemy, FireMonk, GiantBat, GiantCrab, GiantCrayfish, GiantDog, GiantDragonfly, GlintstoneSorcerer, GodrickSoldier, HeavySkeletonSwordsman, Invader, LoneWolf, OceanEnemy, PileOfBones, Player, RottenStray, Samurai, SkeletalBandit, SkeletalMilitiaman, Skeleton, SkeletonMage, TrollKnight, WindEnemy, Wretch
public interface DeathRuneDroppper
The DeathRuneDropper interface represents an enemy that drops a death rune when defeated.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Rune getDeathRune()
    Returns the death rune dropped by the enemy.

  • Method Details

    • getDeathRune

      Rune getDeathRune()
      Returns the death rune dropped by the enemy.
      Returns:
      the death rune dropped by the enemy (by calling the getDeathRune method)
